title: So the Heart Can Dance
description: It was a lovely wedding. Fortunately, it wasn't Tara's.Can love survive through decades of being apart?Aidan O'Brien has made it his mission to find out after reconnecting with Tara Isamu.Although Aidan wants to pick up where they left off, things have changed radically â€” for both of them.Can a childhood crush mature into full-blown love which will make their hearts dance?.
author: Mary   Crawford
